attributes.action: BUILD A New SEN sld school in stevenage
attributes.additional_details: All of our children our entitled to a free school education. Where it comes to our children this is not the case! If there was more sen schools there wouldn't be backlogs of wait lists and parents wouldn't have to give up there jobs go homeschooling the kids that really do need the one to one care! Please help us and get us a new SLD school in stevenage.Our area is crying for the education and our children our being let down by the system not having enough.
attributes.background: Hundreds of kids are missing out on education my son being one as there are no spaces for our sen children. Years waiting lists is not acceptable We have one sen school in stevenage and in desperate need of another!

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your difficulties finding a suitable school for your son, but we can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Local education provision is the responsibility of your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

The Government is responsible for providing funding to local authorities for education provision, and we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for special educational needs and disabilities (SEND) education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634116
